author: Nicole Gallucci
title: Jane Fonda joined TikTok and announced the launch of virtual Fire Drill Friday climate rallies
description: This is not a drill: Jane Fonda has officially joined TikTok. On Thursday night, the 82-year-old actress and activist posted her first video to the app TikTok and announced that she would be reviving her legendary home workouts to help people stay active duri…
content:
This is not a drill: Jane Fonda has officially joined TikTok.
